00038 using namespace std;
00039 
00040 // TranslationAuditType
00041 // An audit type is similar to a regression type where
00042 // new classes of audits are completely independent of other
00043 // audit classes. To implement a new audit type create the
00044 // the code and register the top level method here. 
00045 const TranslationAuditType TRANSLATE_AUDIT_TYPES[] = {
00046   // command line, callback pointer
00047   { std::string("annotation"), &TranslationAudit::auditAnnotation },
00048 };
00049 
00050 #define TRANSLATE_AUDIT_TYPES_SIZE() ( (int) sizeof(TRANSLATE_AUDIT_TYPES[0]) / sizeof( TRANSLATE_AUDIT_TYPES) )
00051 
00052 /*****************************************************************************/
00053 /**
00054  * TranslationAudit::TranslationAudit
00055  * Synopsis:
00056  *
00057  * Main constructor. Does not start the audit logic. To start the audit
00058  * see TranslationAudit::audit
00059  *
00060  *
00061  * @param rte - the single instance RunTimeEnvironment 
00062  */
00063 /*****************************************************************************/
00064 TranslationAudit::TranslationAudit(const class RunTimeEnvironment &rte) :
00065     m_numInvalidGeneProbeSets(0),  m_numInvalidSwitchDesignStrands(0)
00066 {
00067 
00068   APT_ERR_ASSERT(! rte.m_adtOpts.m_audit.empty(), "");
00069 
00070   bool optionFound = false;
00071 
00072   int size = TRANSLATE_AUDIT_TYPES_SIZE();
00073 
00074   for (int i = 0 ; (i < size) && !optionFound; i++) {
00075     if (rte.m_adtOpts.m_audit == TRANSLATE_AUDIT_TYPES[i].m_commandLine) {
00076       optionFound = true;
00077     }
00078 
00079   }
00080 
00081   if (! optionFound) {
00082     APT_ERR_ABORT("invalid option: " + rte.m_adtOpts.m_audit + " is not a recognized audit option value.");
00083   }
00084 
00085 }
00086 // end TranslationAudit::TranslationAudit
00087 /*****************************************************************************/
00088 /*****************************************************************************/
00089 /**
00090  * TranslationAudit::audit
00091  * Synopsis:
00092  *
00093  * The "main" program if you will. Wrapper for the various call backs
00094  * registered in the TranslationAuditType TRANSLATE_AUDIT_TYPES at the
00095  * top of this file.
00096  *
00097  * At the command line the audit option is passed an audit type, i.e.
00098  * "annotation". This type is then looked up in the type table and if
00099  * found the audit is run. Only one audit can be run at a time.
00100  * Invoke the command line multiple times with the various names
00101  * to run various audits. 
00102  *
00103  * An audit type is similar to a regression type or unit test scenario where
00104  * new classes of audits are completely independent of other.
00105  * To implement a new audit type create the
00106  * the code as methods here and then register the top level method in
00107  * TranslationAuditType TRANSLATE_AUDIT_TYPES. Pass in the type name
00108  * at the command line "-a mynewtype" to run the audit. 
00109  * 
00110  * @param rte - the single instance RunTimeEnvironment
00111  * @param TRANSLATE_AUDIT_TYPES - with the registered call backs to invoke. 
00112  *
00113  * @return - exit value 0 if ok, -1 otherwise
00114  */
00115 /*****************************************************************************/
00116 int TranslationAudit::audit(class RunTimeEnvironment & rte)
00117 {
00118 
00119   APT_ERR_ASSERT(! rte.m_adtOpts.m_audit.empty(), "");
00120 
00121   int size = TRANSLATE_AUDIT_TYPES_SIZE();
00122   
00123   for (int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00124     int (TranslationAudit::*callback)(RunTimeEnvironment & rte) =
00125       TRANSLATE_AUDIT_TYPES[i].m_auditCallback;
00126     if ( TRANSLATE_AUDIT_TYPES[i].m_commandLine == rte.m_adtOpts.m_audit ) {
00127       return (this->*callback)(rte);
00128     }
00129   }
00130 
00131 
00132   APT_ERR_ABORT("Programmer error: audit called with " + rte.m_adtOpts.m_audit + ", an unknown audit option type.");
00133 
00134   return -1;
00135 
00136 }
00137 // TranslationAudit::audit
00138 /*****************************************************************************/
00139 /*****************************************************************************/
00140 /**
00141  * TranslationAudit::auditAnnotation
00142  * Synopsis:
00143  *
00144  * Audit the translation file. This is a work in progress as of
00145  * 11/04/2008 and needs completion.
00146  *
00147  *
00148  * @param rte - the single instance RunTimeEnvironment 
00149  *
00150  * @return - exit value, 0 when all is ok, -1 otherwise.
00151  */
00152 /*****************************************************************************/
00153 int TranslationAudit::auditAnnotation(class RunTimeEnvironment & rte)
00154 {
00155 
00156   int exitValue = 0;
00157 
00158   Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, "AUDIT: annotation file.");
00159 
00160   TranslationTableModel auditTT(rte, rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputTTableFile, rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputTTableType);
00161 
00162   m_msgSStr <<  "Input translation file records read:      " << auditTT.size() ;
00163 
00164   Verbose::out(rte.m_currentVerbosity, m_msgSStr.str());
00165   m_msgSStr.str("");
00166 
00167   AnnotationTableModel auditAT(rte, rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputAnnotationFile);
00168 
00169   m_msgSStr <<  "Input annotation table records read:       " << auditAT.size() ;
00170 
00171   Verbose::out(rte.m_currentVerbosity, m_msgSStr.str());
00172   m_msgSStr.str("");
00173 
00174 
00175   std::string gene;
00176 
00177   for (int row = 0; row < auditTT.size(); row++) {
00178 
00179     bool isHeaderRow = auditTT.validateRowIsHeader(row, false);
00180 
00181     if (isHeaderRow) {
00182       gene = auditTT.m_rows[row][auditTT.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_GENE)];
00183       continue;
00184     }
00185 
00186     // PROBE SET
00187     std::string probeSet = auditTT.m_rows[row][auditTT.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_PROBE_SET_ID)];
00188     if (auditAT.m_probeSetIndex.count(probeSet) == 0) {
00189       m_missingProbeSets.push_back(probeSet);
00190       continue;
00191     }
00192 
00193     for (int i = 0; i < auditAT.m_probeSetIndex[probeSet].size(); i++) {
00194 
00195       int annotationRow = auditAT.m_probeSetIndex[probeSet][i];
00196 
00197       // GENE
00198       std::string annotationGene = auditAT.m_rows[annotationRow][AnnotationTableModel::ASSOCIATED_GENE];
00199 
00200       if (annotationGene != gene) {
00201         exitValue = -1;
00202         m_numInvalidGeneProbeSets++;
00203         m_invalidGeneProbeSetsSStr << "translation file row " << row << ": " << probeSet << ", " <<  gene << " != annotation file row " << annotationRow << ": " << probeSet << ", " << annotationGene << endl;
00204 
00205       }
00206       // SWITCH STRAND
00207       std::string annotationSwitchStrand = auditAT.m_rows[annotationRow][AnnotationTableModel::SWITCH_DESIGN_STRAND];
00208       std::string translationSwitchStrand = auditTT.m_rows[row][auditTT.getColumnIndex(ADT_DMET3_TT_SWITCH_STRAND)];
00209 
00210       if ((annotationSwitchStrand == "1") &&
00211           !((translationSwitchStrand == "1") || (translationSwitchStrand == "Y"))) {
00212         m_numInvalidSwitchDesignStrands++;
00213         m_invalidSwitchDesignStrandSStr << "translation  file row " << row << ": " << probeSet << ", " <<  "switch design strand " << translationSwitchStrand << " != annotation table row " << annotationRow << ": " << probeSet << ", " << "switch design strand " << annotationSwitchStrand << endl;
00214       }
00215 
00216     } // for each annotation row per probe set
00217 
00218     // Reference and Variant values
00219     exitValue = _auditAnnotationReferenceVariant(rte) || exitValue;
00220   } // for each translation table row
00221 
00222 
00223   exitValue = _auditAnnotationReport(rte) || exitValue;
00224 
00225   return exitValue;
00226 
00227 }
00228 // end TranslationAudit::auditAnnotation

00233  * TranslationAudit::_auditAnnotationReferenceVariant
00234  * Synopsis:
00235  *
00236  *  A helper function to auditAnnotation broken out strictly for
00237  *  readability purposes.
00238  *  Audits that the "Allele Reported Strand" values like "A // G" reflect
00239  *  the translation table where the first allele is the reference
00240  *
00241  *
00242  * @param rte - the RunTimeEnvironment
00243  *
00244  * @return - 0 if ok, -1 otherwise
00245  */
00246 /*****************************************************************************/
00247 int TranslationAudit::_auditAnnotationReferenceVariant(class RunTimeEnvironment & rte)
00248 {
00249 
00250 
00251   return 0;
00252 
00253 }
00254 // end TranslationAudit::_auditAnnotationReferenceVariant
00255 /*****************************************************************************/
00256 
00257 /*****************************************************************************/
00258 /**
00259  * TranslationAudit::_auditAnnotationReport
00260  * Synopsis:
00261  *
00262  *  A helper function to auditAnnotation broken out strictly for
00263  *  readability purposes.
00264  *
00265  *  Writes the audit report to log and console using Verbose.
00266  *
00267  * @param rte - the RunTimeEnvironment
00268  *
00269  * @return - 0 if ok, -1 otherwise.
00270  */
00271 /*****************************************************************************/
00272 int TranslationAudit::_auditAnnotationReport(class RunTimeEnvironment & rte)
00273 {
00274 
00275   int exitValue = 0;
00276 
00277   // PROBE SET
00278   if (m_missingProbeSets.size() == 0) {
00279     Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, "Probe Set Ids: AUDIT OK (all translation file probe sets accounted for in the annotation file).");
00280   } else {
00281     exitValue = -1;
00282     Verbose::warn(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, "Probe Set Ids: AUDIT FAILED");
00283     m_msgSStr << "Total missing probe sets: " << m_missingProbeSets.size() << endl;
00284     m_msgSStr << "The following translation file probe sets were missing:";
00285     for (int i = 0; i < m_missingProbeSets.size(); i++) {
00286       m_msgSStr << m_missingProbeSets[i] << " ";
00287     }
00288     m_msgSStr << endl;
00289     Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, m_msgSStr.str());
00290     m_msgSStr.str("");
00291   }
00292 
00293   // GENE
00294 
00295   if (m_numInvalidGeneProbeSets == 0) {
00296     Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, "Genes: AUDIT OK (all probe sets have identical gene designations).");
00297   } else {
00298     Verbose::warn(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, "Genes: AUDIT FAILED");
00299     Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, m_invalidGeneProbeSetsSStr.str());
00300   }
00301 
00302   // DESIGN STRAND
00303   if (m_numInvalidSwitchDesignStrands == 0) {
00304     Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, "Switch Design Strand: AUDIT OK (all probe sets have matching switch design strand indicators).");
00305   } else {
00306     Verbose::warn(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, "Switch Design Strand: AUDIT FAILED");
00307     Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, m_invalidSwitchDesignStrandSStr.str());
00308   }
00309   rte.m_programTime.end();
00310 
00311   Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, "Elasped time: " +
00312                rte.m_programTime.getElapsedFormatedString() + ".");
00313 
00314   std::string timeStamp = Util::getTimeStamp();
00315 
00316   Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, "[" + rte.m_programName  + " " + timeStamp + "]  END ");
00317 
00318   return exitValue;
00319 
00320 }
00321 // end TranslationAudit::_auditAnnotationReport
